creator: adrianp@stindustries.net
text:
The Makefile.in in the support/ directory on lines 18, 21, 26 and 28 uses 'cp -
p' to install four files (apxs, apachectl, dbmmanage and envvars-std).

If you do a non-privileged build then su to root and install, the files are 
installed as being owned by the build user not as root.

I think this problem has existed before 2.0.50.
